outline:
1. to moan, growl, utter, muse, mutter, meditate, devise, plot, speak
    1. (Qal)
      1. to roar, growl, groan
      2. to utter, speak
      3. to meditate, devise, muse, imagine
    2. (Poal) to utter
    3. (Hiphil) to mutter
kjv_def: imagine, meditate, mourn, mutter, roar, [idiom] sore, speak, study, talk, utter.
strongs_def: to murmur (in pleasure or anger); by implication, to ponder
